name: mikrotik-node-server
description: Lightweight Node service to manage MikroTik via RouterOS API

scripts.build:windows: npm run clean && pkg . --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/mikrotik-server.exe
scripts.build:mac: npm run clean && pkg . --targets node18-macos-x64 --output dist/mikrotik-server-macos
scripts.build:linux: npm run clean && pkg . --targets node18-linux-x64 --output dist/mikrotik-server-linux
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Run npm run dev to start in watch mode or npm run build to create executables'
